name: Boat Game (Locrian, Markus Franz)
description:
Made in 2 weeks for Adventure Jam 2022

[ WARNING: ] 

Mechanics and everything we're completed, although all around polish and player guidance were not completed in time. Play at your own risk of getting lost, and not knowing what to do!

A game where you fish out objects for people on a small inhabited island.

[ E ] To Open Inventory

[ F ] To Interact

[WASD] Move and Pilot the boat

[MOUSE] Look around

[LEFT CLICK] Cast Fishing Rod

There are two locations, a cave and a broken bridge where lost items are present, Collecting them and bringing them to the villagers nets you Scrap with you can purchase items, and maybe even get some small gifts to make the journey on your boat easier.

The shop is the most far right building, press [ F ] at the door.

[ CREDITS: ] 

Locrian - Music, SFX & Writing

Markus Franz - 3D art & Programming

[ Assets Used: ]

Stylized Water 2 - Water & Foliage
